overview: Fast-paced aero/tone interval programs that challenge your body in diverse ways (truly structured to “break plateaus”). Kelly Coffey also features easily-intensified exercises that let you increase the weight or impact levels as you get stronger. The programs are very straight-forward. The aerobic intervals range from high-impact jumping jacks to low-impact repeaters (sometimes holding dumbbells to maximize fat-burning). The toning intervals are exceptionally time-efficient. They feature compound exercises where you're working multiple muscle groups at once (fast-changing, usually only 12 reps per routine). As always, Kelly's cuing is friendly and positive. DVD includes a short bonus stretch segment. Requires two sets of dumbbells (e.g. 5 and 10 lb.)
title: 30 Minutes to Fitness Plateau Buster
